short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remembers which social media platform you last logged in with for a given site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Which Social is a Chrome extension that remembers which social media platform you last logged in with for a given site. Automated and configurable, it does most of the work for you. You can also disable the extension on sites of issue. Inspired by WhichLogin, which is now gone.
